channel.title: How can I make it so people don't level from summoning?
channel.description: I am making a spawn server, I am using InsidiaX source. I am trying to make it so summoning doesn't level you at all. Because there are players in the wildy who are like level 138, and cannot attack level 126's. Can someone please help me with this issue? I would really appreciate it.

item.title: How can I make it so people don't level from summoning?
item.dc:creator: @chrisrocks4122 chrisrocks4122
